name: @frugally3683/agent-loop-plugin
description: Minimal Task Continuation Plugin - Automatically continues sessions when incomplete tasks remain

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --message 'chore: Bump patch version' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --message 'feat: Bump minor version' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major --message 'BREAKING CHANGE: Major version bump' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run test && npm run lint:fix && npm run build && npm run version:patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run test && npm run lint:fix && npm run build && npm run version:minor
scripts.release:major: npm run test && npm run lint:fix && npm run build && npm run version:major
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run lint:fix && npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: Release preparation' && git push

author: OpenCode Community

opencode.description: Task Continuation Plugin - Automatically continues sessions when incomplete tasks remain
